Articles.Content:
THREAD UNDER CONSTRUCTION

 

Now that SASS has all the bodies I wanted it to have, I thought to make a separate mod to add even more bodies for those people who like a lot of bodies to explore.

Like SASS, this expansion will include stockalike analogues of bodies found in the solar system.

I want to add the most famous/interesting bodies, so everybody list the bodies you think are the most interesting in our solar system, I already have a list, but the more suggestions the best the final product will be!

@GregroxMun I am looking at you!

 

 

 

Required Mods

  • ModuleManager
  • Kopernicus
  • Sigma Dimensions
  • Stock-alike Solar System
  • Duna Restoration Project

Supported Mods

  • KSP-AVC
  • Sigma Binary
     


 

Download

 WARNING: NO RELEASES AVAILABLE YET

If you want to contribute to my caffeine addiction:
 
Don't expect anything in return other than my sincere gratitude. 


 

Changelog 

## NO RELEASES YET ##

 

 

System Description

This mod rearranges bodies from other mods to reproduce the Solar System but with a Kerbal style.

Each body has the same surface gravity, but 1/10th of the radius compared to their real life counterpart.

Currently there are:

  •  

 

Settings

This mod comes with three optional settings, all off by default.

You can activate any of them in the Settings.cfg file you find in the StockalikeSolarSystem folder.

  • KerbalizedNames - Gives all bodies stockalike names
  • RealSizeSystem - Gives all bodies the same size as their real life counterpart
  • UranusTilt - Gives Uranus 90° Axial tilt
  • Year1 - Sets the starting year

 

List of Bodies

Spoiler

UNDER DEVELOPMENT

 

 

Easter Eggs

Stock-alike Solar System Expansion features a certain number of easter eggs. If you find an easter egg in game please do not spoil the surprise for other players. If you want to post about an easter egg in the thread, hide everything inside a spoiler and put a warning outside so that people know that there are easter egg informations inside the spoiler.



 

Images

UNDER DEVELOPMENT
 

 


 

Videos

@GregroxMun made no videos yet

 


 

Credits

No Credits Yet

 


 

License

All Rights Reserved

This mod does not bundle any of the required mods, download every mod from its own thread.

If you like what you see make sure to try the original mods on their own and give credit to the respective developers

Edited May 7, 2017 by Sigma88

Terrific. Here are my suggestions. 

  1. SASS-X: Taking Advantage of New Horizons Edition
  2. * = Not changed or added, listed for completeness
  3.  
  4. Venus - Arin - New Horizons
  5.  
  6. *Jupiter - Jool - Revolting Jool Recolor
  7. -Amalthea - Ameli - Revamped Stock Solar System
  8. -*Io - Leeouch - New Horizons
  9. -*Europa - Eeloo - Stock KSP
  10. -*Ganymede - Slate - Outer Planets Mod
  11. -*Callisto - Bop - Revamped Stock Solar System
  12. -Himalia - Oree - New Horizons
  13.  
  14. *Saturn - Saru - Saru Planet Pack
  15. -*Prometheus - Astid - New Horizons
  16. -Methone - Ovok - Outer Planets Mod
  17. -Mimas - Kelt - Holy System of the Vernians (Unreleased)
  18. -Mimas (Alternate) - The Death Star - The Death Star (Blocky terrain, but fixable with configs)
  19. -Enceladus - Mutel - Holy System of the Vernians (Unreleased)
  20. -Tethys - Nolas - New Horizons
  21. -Dione - Thatmo - Outer Planets Mod
  22. -Rhea - Tylo - Uncharted Lands
  23. -*Titan - Eve - Sigma: Eve Recolor
  24. -Hyperion - Gobe - Revamped Stock Solar System
  25. -*Iapetus - Wal - Outer Planets Mod
  26.  
  27. *Uranus - Cooper Kerman's Arm, Smeared Across Spacetime - Stock KSP
  28. -*Miranda - Polta - Outer Planets Mod
  29. -Ariel - Serran - New Horizons
  30. -Umbriel - Priax - Outer Planets Mod
  31. -*Titania - Tylo - Stock KSP
  32. -Oberon - Atell - New Horizons
  33.  
  34. Quaoar - Urkers - Holy System of the Vernians (Unreleased)
  35. -Wywot - Aptur - New Horizons
  36.  
  37. Orcus - Bop - Uncharted Lands
  38. -Vanth - Pol - Uncharted Lands
  39.  
  40. Makemake - Eli - New Horizons
  41.  
  42. //Side note: Urkers and Menger in HSoV are loosely based on Orcus and Vanth
Edited May 4, 2017 by GregroxMun

Been waiting for this. I recreated voyager 2 and I would love to re-do it with the expansion

 

For Mimas, I would use a recolor of Mobe.

Edited May 5, 2017 by Adstriduum

4 hours ago, Adstriduum said:

Been waiting for this. I recreated voyager 2 and I would love to re-do it with the expansion

 

For Mimas, I would use a recolor of Mobe.

How did that mission go? Did you post any mission reports or videos?

one body that I want to add is Cruithne

 

possibly as a procedural asteroid (like Halley from SASS)

14 hours ago, Sigma88 said:

How did that mission go? Did you post any mission reports or videos?

Mission went excellently! Unfortunately, I do not have any screenshots or videos. However, I plan to redo it again and I will try to have pictures next time.

11 hours ago, Sigma88 said:

one body that I want to add is Cruithne

 

possibly as a procedural asteroid (like Halley from SASS)

Cruithne would be awesome, and so would 2016 HO3. Just try not to go overkill 

I am also working on a mod that makes kerbin look like earth in a stock-alike style. I would be more then happy to let you use it 

Edited May 5, 2017 by Adstriduum

33 minutes ago, Adstriduum said:

I am also working on a mod that makes kerbin look like earth in a stock-alike style. I would be more then happy to let you use it

I like to keep Kerbin as the Earth analogue, it looks similar enough without being exactly identical.

do you remember which version of SASS you used for your mission?

2 hours ago, Sigma88 said:

I like to keep Kerbin as the Earth analogue, it looks similar enough without being exactly identical.

do you remember which version of SASS you used for your mission?

The one before 0.4.0

I also plan to use this in my next carrer playthrough one the expansion comes out. I'm super excided! 

Also, I would use bring KPlus back and use some of the bodies from there. I would use Shay as Eris and possible Kalas as Sedna.

Edited May 5, 2017 by Adstriduum
Hi Sigma88, your Stock alike Solar System link and Sigma Dimensions links are the same one.

Hi Sigma88, your Stock alike Solar System link and Sigma Dimensions links are the same one.

haha

I didn't notice, thanks, this thread is still on the discussion phase tho, so there is no download for SASSx yet

Edited May 7, 2017 by Sigma88

Ideas under consideration

( * = from SASS, listed for completion)

( between parenthesis is explained the reason why the feature is under consideration )

Spoiler
  • *Sun
  • *Mercury
  • *Venus
    • Use a cloud texture for Scaled Space
      (Venus' surface features are not visible from orbit)
  • *Earth
    • Cruithne (coorbital with Earth)
    • *Moon
  • *Mars
    • *Phobos
    • *Deimos
  • *Vesta
  • *Ceres
  • Pallas (Linked to the discovery of Vesta)
  • *Jupiter
    • *Io
    • *Europa
    • *Ganymede
    • *Callisto
  • *Saturn
    • *Prometheus
    • Mimas (one of the most recognizeable moons of Saturn)
    • Enceladus (Ice and Water, could possibly harbor life)
    • *Titan
      • Use a cloud texture for Scaled Space
        (Titan's surface features are not visible from orbit)
    • *Iapetus
  • *Uranus
    • *Miranda
    • Ariel/Umbriel/Oberon (major moons of Uranus, add one or more)
    • *Titania
    • *Sycorax
  • *Neptune
    • *Proteus
    • *Triton
    • *Nereid
  • *Pluto
    • *Charon
  • *Haumea
  • Orcus (Resonance with Pluto)
    • Vanth (Orcus' companion)
  • MakeMake (weird shape)
  • Sedna (Big and Far)
  • Planet 9 (Big-ger and Far-rer)

 

Features that have been proposed but are not listed are not out of consideration
